Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Join us on Wednesday, January 9 at 7 p.m. for a special screening of "RBG" as we get ready for the new Ruth Bader Ginsburg movie, "On the Basis of Sex," opening at The Lyric on Thursday, January 10! Tickets are $10 and benefit the ACLU of Colorado. Save your ticket and show it at any screening of "On the Basis of Sex" for a free small popcorn!

"RBG" Film Screening

Come see the life and experience of a young Ruth Bader Ginsburg paving the way for future women.

Wednesday, January 9, 7 p.m.
The Lyric
1209 N College Ave.
Fort Collins, CO 80524

Purchase Tickets

At the age of 84, U.S. Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg has developed a breathtaking legal legacy while becoming an unexpected pop culture icon. But without a definitive Ginsburg biography, the unique personal journey of this diminutive, quiet warrior's rise to the nation's highest court has been largely unknown, even to some of her biggest fans — until now. "RBG" is a revelatory documentary exploring Ginsburg's exceptional life and career from Betsy West and Julie Cohen, and co-produced by Storyville Films and CNN Films.

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Colorado
